panels.title: Nº messages failed sent per minute

panels.description: Measures total time it takes to probe other nodes (in seconds)
panels.title: Heartbeat response time (sec)

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(job) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(job) group_left sum by (job)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total[$__rate_interval])))
